A0: River Museum and Aquarium in Dubuque
RelatedSentence: As part of the Blue Star Museum program , the National Mississippi River Museum and Aquarium in Dubuque will be offering free admission to active duty military personnel and their families this summer .
The Blue Star Museum program offers families a chance to visit museums this summer , when many of them will have limited resources and limited time together .
